main event: An elongated object of golden silver color was observed hovering and then suddenly accelerated and disappeared toward the horizon in the West.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes,The object was reported to hover at a 20-degree angle,There is speculation that the sighting may have been a balloon or a cloud reflecting sunlight,The report was made by Major Jack Darby, Air Force Liaison Officer, a few days after the sighting,The object was sighted about 30 miles north of Louisville.
sighted object: elongated object of golden silver color
witness description: Principal in a rural high school
